about_the_game:
• To run the DLC, click the arrow button at the top right of the main screen and click HALE.EXE.
  • There is almost no story connection with the main scenario, but since the temporal background is between ACT 2 and 3, it is recommended to play after playing the main story to understand
.

STORY


The Hale family, the influential people in Dome City, were also influential backing that supported the resistance activities of the Speakers.

A few years ago, Walter Hale, the owner of the Hale family, died. There have always been rumors that Ethan Hale, his younger brother, had poisoned him, but nothing has been confirmed. Walter's property goes back to Ethan, and he sets up his own kingdom 'Starry Night Casino' with the property, and even tries to take the life of his daughter, Kellen Hale, who is the heir appointed by his older brother Walter.

Kellen goes to Belladonna Santangelo with Belladonna's friend Charlotte Greden to ask for help. You choose one of the four women as a partner, enter the Starry Night Casino, and decide to negotiate with Ethan...

Game Features


With your partner
Each partner has their own story and abilities. They will help you in their respective abilities.

More variety of puzzles
Starry Night Casino hides the Hale family secret. In the process of finding them, you will face various difficulties.

Additional CGs and Events
Enjoy new scenarios with over 60,000 characters, different endings for each partner, new events, and CGs!
